description: Shows the performance and health status of the VCSA

panels.description:
COMPLIANT: There are no updates available and latest patch has been applied.
NON-COMPLIANT: There are new updates available.
panels.title: Updates

panels.description: With Platform Services Controller, all VMware products within the same environment can share the authentication domain and other services.
panels.title: PSC

panels.description: VMware vPostgres service its required for vCenter database.
panels.title: vPostgres

panels.description: vPostgres Archiver service manages write-ahead logging (WAL) files.
panels.title: vPostgres Archiver

panels.description: VMware vCenter High Availability service its required for vCenter clustering.
panels.title: VCHA

panels.description: vSAN health service checks to monitor the status of cluster components, diagnose issues, and troubleshoot problems. The health checks cover hardware compatibility, network configuration and operation, advanced vSAN configuration options, storage device health, and virtual machine objects.
panels.title: vSAN

panels.description: VMware vSphere Client its required for enabling HTML5 web client.
panels.title: vSphere Client

panels.description: Content Library service provides simple and effective management of OVF templates, ISO images, and scripts for vSphere administrators. The Content Library service lets you synchronize content across vCenter Server instances.
panels.title: Content Library

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "index" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$vcenter$/
list.label: Core
list.name: core
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "cpu" WITH KEY = "index" WHERE "hostname" =~ /$vcenter$/

title: VCSA Health & Performance
